description.english: Find Martin.
description.german: Finde Martin.
description.french: Trouver Martin
description.italian: Trova Martin.
description.spanish: Encuentra a Martin.
description.schinese: 寻找马丁。
description.russian: Найдите Мартина.
description.japanese: マーティンを見つける
description.brazilian: Ache o Martin

description.english: Leave the ranch.
description.german: Verlasse die Ranch.
description.french: Quittez le ranch.
description.italian: Lascia il ranch.
description.spanish: Sal del rancho.
description.schinese: 离开牧场。
description.russian: Покиньте ранчо.
description.japanese: 牧場を去る
description.brazilian: Saia da estância

description.english: Find your way out of the hospital.
description.german: Entkomme aus dem Krankenhaus.
description.french: Trouvez la sortie de l'hôpital.
description.italian: Trova la via d'uscita dall'ospedale.
description.spanish: Encuentra la forma de salir del hospital.
description.schinese: 寻找离开医院的方法。
description.russian: Найдите выход из больницы.
description.japanese: 病院から脱出する
description.brazilian: Encontre uma maneira de sair do hospital

description.english: Go through the forest.
description.german: Gehe durch den Wald.
description.french: Traversez la forêt.
description.italian: Attraversa la foresta.
description.spanish: Atraviesa el bosque.
description.schinese: 穿过森林。
description.russian: Пройдите сквозь лес.
description.japanese: 森を抜ける
description.brazilian: Cruze a floresta

description.english: Witness the Arrival.
description.german: Erlebe die Ankunft.
description.french: Soyez témoin de l'arrivée.
description.italian: Osserva l'arrivo.
description.spanish: Sé testigo de la llegada.
description.schinese: 见证外星人降临。
description.russian: Станьте свидетелем прибытия.
description.japanese: 侵略を目撃する
description.brazilian: Observe a chegada

description.english: Reach the road beyond the campsite.
description.german: Erreiche die Straße hinter dem Campingplatz
description.french: Atteignez la route après le camp.
description.italian: Raggiungi la strada oltre il campeggio.
description.spanish: Llega hasta la carretera más allá del campamento.
description.schinese: 抵达营地外的道路。
description.russian: Доберитесь до дороги вне лагеря.
description.japanese: 野営地を越えて道に到達する
description.brazilian: Vá até a estrada no outro lado do acampamento

description.english: Cross the river through the trainwreck.
description.german: Überquere den Fluss durch das Zugwrack.
description.french: Traversez la rivière en passant par l'épave de train.
description.italian: Attraversa il fiume oltrepassando il disastro ferroviario.
description.spanish: Cruza el río a través del tren descarrilado.
description.schinese: 通过火车残骸过河。
description.russian: Пересеките реку, пробравшись сквозь разбитый поезд.
description.japanese: 列車事故現場を越えて川を渡る
description.brazilian: Cruze o rio passando pelo acidente de trem

description.english: Survive until you reach the hospital.
description.german: Überlebe die Verfolgungsjagd.
description.french: Arrivez vivant à l'hôpital.
description.italian: Sopravvivi fino all'ospedale.
description.spanish: Sobrevive hasta llegar al hospital.
description.schinese: 在抵达医院之前活下来。
description.russian: Доберитесь живыми до больницы.
description.japanese: 病院まで生き残る
description.brazilian: Sobreviva até chegar ao hospital

description.english: Find a way out of the pump station.
description.german: Finde einen Weg aus der Pumpstation.
description.french: Trouvez la sortie de la station de pompage.
description.italian: Trova una via d'uscita dalla stazione di pompaggio.
description.spanish: Encuentra la forma de salir la estación de bombeo.
description.schinese: 寻找离开泵站的方法。
description.russian: Найдите выход из насосной станции.
description.japanese: ポンプステーションから脱出する
description.brazilian: Encontre uma maneira de sair da Estação de Bombeamento

description.english: Reach the dock.
description.german: Erreiche das Dock.
description.french: Atteignez le port.
description.italian: Raggiungi il molo.
description.spanish: Llega hasta el muelle.
description.schinese: 抵达港口。
description.russian: Доберитесь до пристани.
description.japanese: 波止場に到達する
description.brazilian: Vá até as docas

description.english: Get on the boat and escape.
description.german: Steige in das Boot und entkomme.
description.french: Échappez-vous sur le bateau.
description.italian: Sali su una barca e scappa.
description.spanish: Súbete al barco y escapa.
description.schinese: 上船逃离。
description.russian: Садитесь в лодку и спасайтесь.
description.japanese: 船に乗って避難する
description.brazilian: Entre no barco e fuja

description.english: Complete the game on "Easy" or higher difficulty.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel auf "leicht" oder höher ab.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en mode "facile" ou plus.
description.italian: Completa il gioco a difficoltà "Facile" o superiore.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en dificultad Fácil o superior.
description.schinese: 在“简单”或更高难度下通关游戏。
description.russian: Закончите игру на легком уровне сложности или выше.
description.japanese: 難易度「易しい」以上の難易度でゲームをクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo na dificuldade "Fácil" ou superior

description.english: Complete the game on "Medium" or higher difficulty.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel auf "Normal" oder höher ab.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en mode "Normal" ou plus.
description.italian: Completa il gioco a difficoltà "Media" o superiore.
description.spanish: Completa el juego en dificultad Normal o superior.
description.schinese: 在“普通”或更高难度下通关游戏。
description.russian: Закончите игру на среднем уровне сложности или выше.
description.japanese: 難易度「ノーマル」以上の難易度でゲームをクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo na dificuldade "Normal" ou superior

description.english: Complete the game on "Hard" difficulty.
description.german: Beende das Spiel auf dem Schwierigkeitsgrad Schwer.
description.french: Terminez le jeu en difficulté difficile
description.italian: Completa il gioco a difficoltà "Difficile".
description.spanish: Completa el juego en dificultad Difícil.
description.schinese: 以“困难”难度完成游戏。
description.russian: Закончите игру на высоком уровне сложности.
description.japanese: 難易度「難しい」でゲームをクリアする
description.brazilian: Termine o jogo na dificuldade Difícil

description.english: Collect all the documents scattered in an area.
description.german: Sammle alle Dokumente, die in einem Gebiet verstreut sind.
description.french: Récupérez tous les documents dans une zone.
description.italian: Raccogli tutti i documenti sparsi in un'area.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los documentos de una zona.
description.schinese: 收集分散在一个区域中的所有文件。
description.russian: Соберите все документы, разбросанные в зоне.
description.japanese: 1つのエリアに散らばったドキュメントを全て集める
description.brazilian: Colete todos os documentos espalhados em uma área

description.english: Collect all the documents scattered along your journey.
description.german: Sammle alle Dokumente auf der Reise.
description.french: Récupérez tous les documents au long du trajet.
description.italian: Raccogli tutti i documenti durante l'avventura.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los documentos de la aventura.
description.schinese: 收集沿途散落的所有文件。
description.russian: Соберите все документы, разбросанные на вашем пути.
description.japanese: 旅で手に入るドキュメントを全て集める
description.brazilian: Colete todos os documentos ao longo da jornada

description.german: Sammle ein Spielzeug.
description.french: Récupérez un jouet.

description.spanish: Encuentra un juguete.
description.schinese: 收集一件玩具。
description.russian: Подберите одну игрушку.
description.japanese: おもちゃを1個集める
description.brazilian: Colete um brinquedo

description.german: Sammle 10 Spielzeuge.
description.french: Récupérez 10 jouets.
description.italian: Raccogli 10 giocattoli.
description.spanish: Encuentra 10 juguetes.
description.schinese: 收集十件玩具。
description.russian: Соберите 10 игрушек.
description.japanese: おもちゃを10個集める
description.brazilian: Colete 10 brinquedos

description.english: Collect all toys along your journey.
description.german: Sammle alle Spielzeuge auf der Reise ein.
description.french: Récupérez tous les jouets au long du trajet.
description.italian: Raccogli tutti i giocattoli durante l'avventura.
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los juguetes de la aventura.

description.russian: Соберите все игрушки, найденные на вашем пути.

description.english: Collect a mixtape.
description.german: Sammle ein Mixtape.
description.french: Récupérez une mixtape.

description.russian: Подберите сборник.
description.japanese: ミックステープを1個集める

description.german: Sammle alle Mixtapes auf der Reise.
description.french: Récupérez toutes les mixtapes au long du trajet.
description.italian: Raccogli tutte le cassette durante l'avventura.
description.spanish: Encuentra todas las cintas de la aventura.

description.english: Unlock your first Concept Art in the Extra Menu.
description.german: Schalte dein erstes Konzeptkunstwerk im Extras-Menü frei.
description.french: Déverrouillez votre premier concept art dans le menu Extras.
description.italian: Sblocca la prima concept art nel menu Extra.
description.spanish: Desbloquea tu primer arte conceptual del menú Extras.
description.schinese: 在额外菜单中解锁第一件概念艺术。

description.english: Open your first briefcase.
description.german: Öffne deinen ersten Aktenkoffer.
description.french: Ouvrez votre premier porte-documents.
description.italian: Apri la prima valigetta.
description.spanish: Abre tu primer maletín.
description.schinese: 打开第一个公文包。
description.russian: Откройте свой первый портфель.
description.japanese: 最初のブリーフケースを開く
description.brazilian: Abra sua primeira maleta

description.english: Open all briefcases along your journey.
description.german: Öffne alle Aktenkoffer auf der Reise.
description.french: Ouvrez tous les porte-documents au long du trajet.
description.italian: Apri tutte le valigette nel corso dell'avventura.
description.spanish: Abre todos los maletines de la aventura.
description.schinese: 打开沿途散落的所有公文包。
description.russian: Соберите все портфели, найденные на вашем пути.
description.japanese: 旅で見つかるブリーフケースを全て開く
description.brazilian: Abra todas as maletas durante a jornada

description.english: Your first death due to making too much noise.
description.german: Stirb zum ersten Mal, weil du zu viel Lärm gemacht hast.
description.french: Mourez une première fois pour avoir fait trop de bruit.
description.italian: Muori per aver fatto troppo rumore per la prima volta.
description.spanish: Muere por primera vez por hacer demasiado ruido.
description.schinese: 第一次因发出太多噪音而死亡。
description.russian: Впервые умрите от того, что произвели слишком много шума.
description.japanese: 物音の出しすぎで初めて死ぬ
description.brazilian: Morra por fazer muito barulho pela primeira vez

description.english: Successfully resist an asthma attack.
description.german: Widerstehe erfolgreich einem Asthma-Anfall.
description.french: Résistez à une crise d'asthme.
description.italian: Resisti a un attacco d'asma.
description.spanish: Evita que te dé un ataque de asma.
description.schinese: 成功抵御一次哮喘发作。
description.russian: Успешно предотвратите приступ астмы.
description.japanese: ぜんそく発作を抑える
description.brazilian: Resista a um ataque de asma

description.english: Use 30 inhalers.
description.german: Verwende 30 Inhalatoren.
description.french: Utilisez 30 inhalateurs.
description.italian: Usa 30 inalatori.
description.spanish: Usa 30 inhaladores.
description.schinese: 使用 30 次吸入器。
description.russian: Используйте 30 ингаляторов.
description.japanese: 吸入器を30回使う
description.brazilian: Use 30 inaladores

description.english: Use 15 flares.
description.german: Verwende 15 Fackeln.
description.french: Utilisez 15 fusées éclairantes.
description.italian: Usa 15 razzi
description.spanish: Usa 15 bengalas.
description.schinese: 使用 15 次照明弹。
description.russian: Используйте 15 сигнальных факелов.
description.japanese: フレアを15回使う
description.brazilian: Use 15 sinalizadores

description.english: Completely empty 20 sandbags.
description.german: Entleere 20 Sandsäcke vollständig.
description.french: Videz 20 sacs de sable.
description.italian: Svuota completamente 20 sacchi di sabbia.
description.spanish: Vacía por completo 20 sacos de arena.
description.schinese: 完全清空 20 个沙袋。
description.russian: Полностью используйте 20 мешков с песком.
description.japanese: 砂袋を20個完全に空にする
description.brazilian: Esvazie totalmente 20 sacos de areia

description.english: Break 25 bottles.
description.german: Zerbrich 25 Flaschen.
description.french: Brisez 25 bouteilles.
description.italian: Rompi 25 bottiglie.
description.spanish: Rompe 25 botellas.
description.schinese: 打破 25 个瓶子。
description.russian: Разбейте 25 бутылок.
description.japanese: ボトルを25本壊す
description.brazilian: Quebre 25 garrafas

displayName.french: Une course à travers les buissons

description.english: Complete the area where Mark died in "The Forest" in under 1:45 minutes.
description.german: Passiere in weniger als 1:45 Minuten die Stelle, an der Mark in „Der Wald“ starb.
description.french: Traversez la zone où Mark est mort dans « La forêt » en moins de 1 min 45 s.
description.italian: Completa l'area in cui Mark è morto nel livello "La foresta" in meno di 1 minuto e 45 secondi.
description.spanish: Cruza la zona donde Mark murió de «El bosque» en menos de 1:45 minutos.
description.schinese: 在 1 分 45 秒内通过“森林”关卡中马克丧生的地方。
description.russian: Пройдите район, в котором Марк погиб в «Лесу», менее чем за 1:45 мин.
description.japanese: 「森」でマークが死んだエリアを1分45秒以内に通り抜ける
description.brazilian: Passe pela área onde o Mark morreu em "A Floresta" em menos de 1min e 45s

description.english: Collect the plank and leave the house garden in "The Forest" in under 3:30 minutes.
description.german: Hol dir das Brett und verlasse in weniger als 3:30 Minuten den Garten des Hauses in „Der Wald“.
description.french: Récupérez la planche et sortez du jardin de la maison dans « La forêt » en moins de 3 min 30 s.
description.italian: Raccogli l'asse e lascia il giardino nel livello "La foresta" in meno di 3 minuti e 30 secondi.
description.spanish: Consigue la tabla y sal del jardín de la casa de «El bosque» en menos de 3:30 minutos.
description.schinese: 收集木板，在 3 分 30 秒内离开“森林”关卡中房屋的花园。
description.russian: Подберите доску и покиньте сад дома в «Лесу» менее чем за 3:30 мин.
description.japanese: 「森」で板材を集めて家の庭を3分30秒以内に立ち去る
description.brazilian: Colete a Tábua e saia do jardim da casa em "A Floresta" em menos de 3min e 30s

displayName.japanese: キャラバンからの失踪

description.english: Leave the parking lot at "The Campsite" in under 7:00 minutes.
description.german: Verlasse in weniger als 7:00 Minuten den Parkplatz in „Der Campingplatz“.
description.french: Quittez le parking dans « Le camp » en moins de 7 min.
description.italian: Lascia il parcheggio del livello "Il campeggio" in meno di 7 minuti.
description.spanish: Sal del aparcamiento de «El campamento» en menos de 7 min.
description.schinese: 在 7 分钟内离开“营地”关卡中的停车场。
description.russian: Покиньте парковку «Лагеря» менее чем за 7 мин.
description.japanese: 「野営地」で駐車場を7分以内に立ち去る
description.brazilian: Saia do estacionamento em 'O Acampamento' em menos de 7 min

description.english: Cross the train over the bridge in "The Trainwreck" in under 6:30 minutes.
description.german: Überquere in unter 6:30 Minuten den Zug über der Brücke in „Das Zugwrack“.
description.french: Traversez tout le train sur le pont dans « L'épave de train » en moins de 6 min 30 s.
description.italian: Supera il treno sul ponte del livello "Il disastro ferroviario" in meno di 6 minuti e 30 secondi.
description.spanish: Atraviesa el tren sobre el puente de «El tren descarrilado» en menos de 6:30 minutos.
description.schinese: 在 6 分 30 秒内通过“火车残骸”关卡中桥上的火车。
description.russian: Пройдите по поезду на мосту в «Разбитом поезде» менее чем за 6:30 мин.
description.japanese: 「列車事故」で橋の上にある列車を6分30秒以内に越える
description.brazilian: Cruze o trem pela ponte em "O Acidente de Trem" em menos de 6min e 30s

description.english: Deactivate the pumps and reach the sewer in "The Pump Station" in under 7:00 minutes.
description.german: Deaktiviere die Pumpen und erreiche in unter 7:00 Minuten die Kanalisation in „Die Pumpstation“.
description.french: Désactivez les pompes et atteindre les égouts dans « La station » de pompage en moins de 7 min.
description.italian: Disattiva le pompe e raggiungi le fogne nel livello "La stazione di pompaggio" in meno di 7 minuti.
description.spanish: Desactiva todas las bombas y llega a las alcantarillas de «La estación de bombeo» en menos de 7 min.
description.schinese: 在 7 分钟内于“泵站”关卡中停用水泵并抵达下水道。
description.russian: Отключите насосы и доберитесь до канализации на «Насосной станции» менее чем за 7 мин.
description.japanese: 「ポンプステーション」で7分以内にポンプを止めて下水道に到達する
description.brazilian: Desative as bombas e chegue aos esgotos em "A Estação de Bombeamento" em menos de 7min

displayName.english: In and Out in a Second
displayName.german: Rein und raus in einer Sekunde
displayName.italian: Dentro e fuori in un secondo

description.english: Turn the power back on and leave the warehouse in "The Harbor" in under 3:15 minutes.
description.german: Schalte den Strom wieder an und verlasse in unter 3:15 Minuten das Lagerhaus in „Der Hafen“.
description.french: Remettez le courant et ressortez de l'entrepôt dans « Le port » en moins de 3 min 15 s.
description.italian: Riattiva la corrente e lascia il magazzino nel livello "Il porto" in meno di 3 minuti e 15 secondi.
description.spanish: Restablece la corriente y sal del almacén de «El puerto» en menos de 3:15 min.
description.schinese: 在 3 分 15 秒内重新打开电源并离开“港口”关卡中的仓库。
description.russian: Снова включите питание и покиньте склад в «Порту» менее чем за 3:15 мин.
description.japanese: 「波止場」で3分15秒以内に電力をつけて倉庫から出る
description.brazilian: Religue a energia e saia do galpão em "O Porto" em menos de 3min e 15s

displayName.german: Wie der Wind auf dem Wasser
displayName.spanish: Como el viento sobre el agua

description.english: Leave the shipyard in "The Harbor" in under 2:15 minutes.
description.german: Verlasse in weniger als 2:15 Minuten die Werft in „Der Hafen“.
description.french: Quittez le chantier naval dans « Le port » en moins de 2 min 15 s.
description.italian: Lascia il cantiere navale nel livello "Il porto" in meno di 2 minuti e 15 secondi.
description.spanish: Sal del astillero de «El puerto» en menos de 2:15.
description.schinese: 在 2 分 15 秒内离开“港口”关卡中的造船厂。
description.russian: Покиньте верфь в «Порту» менее чем за 2:15 мин.
description.japanese: 「波止場」で2分15秒以内に造船所を立ち去る
description.brazilian: Saia do Estaleiro em "O Porto" em menos de 2min e 15s

description.english: After activating the sprinklers, exit the pool in "The Fire Station" in under 7:00 minutes.
description.german: Verlasse in weniger als 7:00 Minuten den Pool in „Die Feuerwache“, nachdem die Sprinkler aktiv sind.
description.french: Après activation des arroseurs, sortez du bassin dans « La caserne de pompiers » en moins de 7 min.
description.italian: Attivati gli irrigatori, lascia la piscina nel livello "La caserma dei pompieri" entro 7 minuti.
description.spanish: Tras activar los aspersores, sal de la piscina de «El parque de bomberos» en menos de 7 min.
description.schinese: 启动洒水器后，在 7 分钟内离开“消防站”关卡中的水池。
description.russian: После включения разбрызгивателей покиньте бассейн в «Пожарной станции» менее чем за 7 мин.
description.japanese: 「消防署」でスプリンクラーを起動したあと7分以内にプールから立ち去る
description.brazilian: Depois de ativar os aspersores, saia da piscina em "O Corpo de Bombeiros" em menos de 7min

description.english: Reach the boat in "The Fire Station" in under 2:15 minutes.
description.german: Erreiche in weniger als 2:15 Minuten das Boot in „Die Feuerwache“.
description.french: Atteignez le bateau dans « La caserne de pompiers » en moins de 2 min 15 s.
description.italian: Raggiungi la barca nel livello "La caserma dei pompieri" in meno di 2 minuti e 15 secondi.
description.spanish: Llega al barco de «El parque de bomberos» en menos de 2:15 min.
description.schinese: 在 2 分 15 秒内抵达“消防站”关卡中的小船。
description.russian: Доберитесь до лодки в «Пожарной станции» менее чем за 2:15 мин.
description.japanese: 「消防署」で2分15秒以内にボートに到達する
description.brazilian: Vá até o barco em "O Corpo de Bombeiros" em menos de 2min e 15s

description.english: Look at all the children's drawings in the basement of "The Ranch."
description.german: Schau dir alle Kinderzeichnungen im Keller der Ranch an.
description.french: Dans « Le ranch », regardez tous les dessins d'enfants dans la cave.
description.italian: Osserva tutti i disegni dei bambini nel seminterrato nel livello "Il ranch".
description.spanish: Mira todos los dibujos de los niños en el sótano de «El rancho».
description.schinese: 在“牧场”关卡中观看地下室里所有的儿童画作。
description.russian: Посмотрите на все детские рисунки в подвале «Ранчо».
description.japanese: 牧場の地下室にある子供の絵をすべて見る
description.brazilian: Olhe todos os desenhos das crianças no porão da estância

description.english: Light all the candles in the hospital chapel.
description.german: Zünde alle Kerzen in der Krankenhauskapelle an.
description.french: Allumez toutes les bougies de la chapelle de l'hôpital.
description.italian: Accendi tutte le candele nella cappella dell'ospedale.
description.spanish: Enciende todas las velas en la capilla del hospital.
description.schinese: 点亮医院小教堂的所有蜡烛。
description.russian: Зажгите все свечи в больничной часовне.
description.japanese: 病院のチャペルにあるろうそく全てに火を点ける
description.brazilian: Acenda todas as velas na capela do hospital

description.english: Throw a bottle at each of the four large animal statues in the garden of the forest house.
description.german: Wirf eine Flasche auf jede der 4 großen Tierstatuen im Garten des Waldhauses.
description.french: Lancez une bouteille sur chacune des 4 statues d'animaux dans le jardin de la maison dans la forêt.
description.italian: Tira una bottiglia contro ognuna delle quattro statue di animali nel giardino della casa nel bosco.
description.spanish: Lanza botellas a las cuatro estatuas de animales en el jardín de la casa del bosque.
description.schinese: 向森林小屋花园中的 4 个大型动物雕像各扔一个瓶子。
description.russian: Бросьте по бутылке в каждую из четырех больших статуй животных в саду лесного домика.
description.japanese: 森の家の庭にある4つの大きな動物の像にボトルを投げつける
description.brazilian: Jogue uma garrafa em cada uma das quatro estátuas grandes de animais no jardim da casa na floresta

description.english: Find the combination to open the briefcase in "The Lake House."
description.german: Finde die Kombination, um den Aktenkoffer in „Der See“ zu öffnen.
description.french: Trouvez la combinaison du porte-documents dans « Le lac ».
description.italian: Trova la combinazione per aprire la valigetta nel livello "La casa sul lago".
description.spanish: Encuentra la combinación para abrir el maletín en «La casa del lago».
description.schinese: 找到密码，打开“湖泊小屋”关卡中的公文包。
description.russian: Найдите комбинацию кода, чтобы открыть портфель в «Доме на озере».
description.japanese: 「湖の家」にあるブリーフケースを開く組み合わせを見つける
description.brazilian: Encontre a combinação para abrir a maleta em “A Casa do Lago”

description.english: Drop the two buckets from the porch in "The Campsite."
description.german: Wirf die 2 Eimer von der Veranda in „Der Campingplatz“.
description.french: Lâchez les deux seaux du porche dans « Le camp ».
description.italian: Lascia cadere i due secchi dal portico nel livello "Il campeggio".
description.spanish: Tira los dos cubos del porche en «El campamento».
description.schinese: 在“营地”关卡中，从门廊扔下 2 个水桶。
description.russian: Сбросьте два ведра с крыльца в «Лагере».
description.japanese: 「野営地」のポーチから2つのバケツを下ろす
description.brazilian: Derrube os dois baldes da varanda em “O Acampamento”

description.english: Scare away all the flocks of birds in "The Trainwreck."
description.german: Verscheuche alle Vogelschwärme in „Das Zugwrack“.
description.french: Effrayez les oiseaux dans « L'épave du train ».
description.italian: Spaventa tutti gli stormi di uccelli nel livello "Il disastro ferroviario".
description.spanish: Espanta a todas las bandadas de pájaros en «El tren descarrilado».
description.schinese: 在“火车残骸”关卡中吓跑所有鸟群。
description.russian: Распугайте все стаи птиц в «Разбитом поезде».
description.japanese: 「列車事故」ですべての鳥の群れを飛び立たせる
description.brazilian: Enxote todos os bandos de pássaros em “O Acidente de Trem”

description.english: Complete "The Chase" without dying.
description.german: Schließe das Level „Die Verfolgungsjagd“ ab, ohne zu sterben.
description.french: Terminez le niveau « La poursuite » sans mourir.le niveau « La poursuite » sans mourir
description.italian: Completa il livello "L'inseguimento" senza mai morire.
description.spanish: Completa «La persecución» sin morir ni una vez.
description.schinese: 完成“追逐”关卡且未死亡。
description.russian: Завершите уровень «Погоня», ни разу не умерев.
description.japanese: 「チェース」を死なずにクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua o nível “A Perseguição” sem morrer nenhuma vez

description.english: Find the diner's door combination on the first try in "The Harbor."
description.german: Finde die Türkombination der Hafentür beim ersten Versuch.
description.french: Trouvez du premier coup la combinaison de la porte du port.
description.italian: Trova al primo tentativo la combinazione della porta della tavola calda nel livello "Il porto".
description.spanish: Descubre la combinación de la puerta de la cafetería al primer intento en «El puerto».
description.schinese: 在“港口”关卡中，首次尝试就找到小餐馆大门的密码。
description.russian: Найдите комбинацию кода дверей закусочной в «Порту» с первой попытки.
description.japanese: 「港」のドアの組み合わせを一度で見つける
description.brazilian: Encontre a combinação para a porta do restaurante em “O Porto” na primeira tentativa

description.english: Have the monster destroy three screens (over the tutorial ones) in "The Harbor" in the same attempt.
description.german: Lass das Monster 3 Bildschirme (über die Tutorials) im Hafen im selben Versuch zerstören.
description.french: Obtenez du monstre qu’il brise 3 écrans (à part ceux du tutoriel) dans « Le port » sur 1 même essai.
description.italian: Fai rompere al mostro tre schermi (tutorial escluso) nel livello "Il porto" nello stesso tentativo.
description.spanish: El monstruo debe romper tres pantallas (tras el tutorial) en un mismo intento en «El puerto».
description.schinese: 在“港口”关卡中，一次性让怪物摧毁 3 个屏幕（教程中摧毁的屏幕除外）。
description.russian: Позвольте монстру уничтожить три экрана (поверх обучающих) в «Порту» с одного раза.
description.japanese: 「波止場」でモンスターに3つのスクリーン（チュートリアルのものを除く）を同時に破壊させる
description.brazilian: Faça o monstro destruir três telas (acima das telas do Tutorial) em “O Porto” na mesma tentativa

description.english: Turn on the pool lights in "The Fire Station."
description.german: Schalte die Lichter im Pool der Feuerwache ein.
description.french: Allumez l'éclairage dans la piscine de « La caserne de pompiers ».
description.italian: Accendi le luci nella piscina del livello "La caserma dei pompieri".
description.spanish: Enciende las luces de la piscina de «El parque de bomberos».
description.schinese: 在“消防站”关卡中，打开水池的灯。
description.russian: Включите свет в бассейне в «Пожарной станции».
description.japanese: 「消防署」のプールで照明を点ける
description.brazilian: Ligue as luzes na piscina em “O Corpo de Bombeiros”
